title: Doom bots Icon
body: When will we recieve our doom bots Iicon as promised when you slayed them? I defeated them in both modes : The Gauntled and Teemoing. I still didn't recieve the icon, bug or .. ?

replies.body:
The [Teemoing Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/the-teemoing-2016) mentions:

>"*Icons will be granted up to two weeks after November 3, 2016 at 23:59 PT."

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Why have some people already received their icon? if you don't mind me asking... i really want that teemo icon ^u^

Because we're sending them out in waves to ensure they get out to everyone. This has been standard procedure for the last few Icons we've been granting for various events or promotions.

I hope that clears this up!
